Articles.Content:
The events that led to my creations (after rigorous testing and crashes) for now. There are more to come.

--Acquisition of latest KSP- Check

--Check and download for new mods (C7, Nova Punch and many others)- Check

--Spaceplane Creation- Check

--*points thumb at the mun prior to launch*

Munarskip One is comprised mostly of C7 Aerospace parts, life support module and communications node/living quarters module, Solid Rocket boosters get it to 10,000m and then the Liquid Engine takes over for the rest of the flight (orbit, TMI, Orbital Insertion, the ride home)

There were tests to use aerospike engines- it made Munarskip an SSTO. Hell yeah!

Vector Station is outfitted with the 7 person module with life support, communications node, space station module, solar panels, science experiments, RCS... Everything. (though only 3 people man it, it provides extra space for provisions, electronics, tool kits, whatever\'s needed)

Anyways here are some of my favorite pics (out of the f1 fiasco during each mission )

Enjoy!

Do like vector station. Some parts I recognise, some parts I don\'t.

Got parts list/link?
